credit_line: Gift of Richard F. Holmes, Class of 1946
title: M.J. by A.W., July 26 - 72
inscriptions: lower edge in black ink: M.J. by A.W. [thumbprint]; right edge in black ink: JULY 26 -(72; verso on Gotham Book Mart envelope: June 1975/ To Richard/ On this special/ day- we all drink a/ toast. If only Mick/ were here to drink with/ us./ Love/ Nancy/ and the Mick/ (who made it all/ possible!)/ June 27, 1975
